## hpr1544 :: An Open Source News Break from Opensource.com

 In this episode: The true value of open source, an introduction to the new Authors Alliance, and an OpenStack challenge.
Links:

https://opensource.com/life/14/5/true-value-of-open-source
https://opensource.com/life/14/5/authors-alliance
https://opensource.com/business/14/5/poll-openstack-releases
